title: Aperitivo Siciliano - Iddu and Idda - Hand-Painted Caltagirone Ceramic Shot Glass Set of 4 - Modern, Colorful, Fun Style - Perfect for Espresso and Liquors - Unique Gift Idea - Made in Italy
features: my name is Carmelo, Founder of Aperitivo Siciliano: Curating the Finest Sicilian Craftsmanship for You with Expertise and Passion

Quality Sicilian Craftsmanship: Each shot glass is the result of the skill and tradition of the master ceramists of Caltagirone, crafted using ancient techniques to ensure a unique and high-quality product.
Unique and Colorful Design: Featuring a modern, colorful, and fun aesthetic, these shot glasses add a touch of joy and style to your daily coffee routine or special occasions for serving liquors.
Versatile Use: Ideal for savoring your espresso or offering a liqueur to guests, these shot glasses are a versatile addition to any home.
Perfect Size: Designed for everyday use, these shot glasses are ideally sized for serving your favorite coffee or liquor, blending practicality with beauty
Thoughtful and Original Gift: Looking for a special gift? This set of Caltagirone ceramic shot glasses is an excellent choice for friends, family, or collectors of artistic ceramics.
description: Discover the beauty and charm of Sicilian ceramics with our exclusive set of 4 hand-painted shot glasses, coming straight from the ancient workshops of Caltagirone. These unique pieces are the culmination of ancient ceramic wisdom meeting a lively and modern style, perfect for those looking to add a touch of originality to their table. Crafted with passion and precision, these shot glasses represent the best of Sicilian craftsmanship, offering not just a utilitarian object but a piece of history and culture. Whether you're looking to enhance your coffee breaks or offer your guests a unique experience serving liquors, these shot glasses are the perfect choice. More than just kitchenware, each shot glass is a work of art, telling a story of creativity and tradition. They are the ideal gift for anyone who appreciates quality craftsmanship and original design, guaranteed to impress on any occasion. Embrace the spirit and warmth of Sicily with this set of Caltagirone ceramic shot glasses, a true expression of art, taste, and fun.
